title: not that im complaining but..
body:
whats up with all the legendary skins lately? theres been one almost with every new patch of skins, when they use to be more rare in previous seasons. 
has anyone else noticed this? 
again, not complaining , i have no problem with the skins thanks for legendary {{champion:202}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:236}} skins but im genuinely asking.
